data.name: Inner Voices Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Original Inner Voices soundtrack is an atmospheric album, consisting of 17 tracks.

Composed by Halil Can Öztürk from Turkey.

The piano-dominated, moving, melancholy, minimalistic compositions will allow you to travel back to the dark maze of the game.

  • Track 01: Shades of Sorrow (1:32)
  • Track 02: Is there anybody out there? (1:24)
  • Track 03: Well of memories (3:22)
  • Track 04: Eternal punishment (2:23)
  • Track 05: Flash of hope (1:13)
  • Track 06: Endless wandering (1:49)
  • Track 07: Redemption (1:16)
  • Track 08: The Sermon (2:00)
  • Track 09: The Purgatory (2:00)
  • Track 10: Behind you (1:34)
  • Track 11: I won’t leave you alone (1:14)
  • Track 12: One last try (2:11)
  • Track 13: Confusion (2:19)
  • Track 14: The Creeping (1:25)
  • Track 15: No way out (1:59)
  • Track 16: Riddles (1:44)
  • Track 17: In my darkest hour (2:59)

Note:

Songs will be downloaded to the game DLC folder in your Steam Directory:

[…]\Steam\steamapps\common\InnerVoices\InnerVoicesSoundtrack
